name: Awesome-Xcode-Plugins
tagline: Awesome Xcode Plugins for easy development process
body:
### Welcome to Awesome Xcode Plugins.
This is a Collection of Awesome Xcode Plugins which ease out things needed as a developer

### Install Guide
Use [Alcatraz](http://alcatraz.io/), package manager for easier install/un-install of Xcode Plugins

### List of Plugins

1. [KSImageNamed](https://github.com/ksuther/KSImageNamed-Xcode)
---
Provides autocomplete for imageNamed: calls.

2. [ColorSenseRainbow](https://github.com/NorthernRealities/ColorSenseRainbow)
---
Working with colors more visual.

3. [Lin](https://github.com/questbeat/Lin)
---
Provides auto-completion for NSLocalizedString..

4. [SCXcodeSwitchExpander](https://github.com/stefanceriu/SCXcodeSwitchExpander)
---
Enables switch cases autocompletion.

5. [VVDocumenter](https://github.com/onevcat/VVDocumenter-Xcode)
---
Helps you write documentation comment easier, for both Objective-C and Swift.

6. [XAlign](https://github.com/qfish/XAlign)
---
Align regular code. it can align anything in any way you want.

7. [XToDo](https://github.com/trawor/XToDo)
---
 To Collect and list the `TODO`,`FIXME`.

8. [CocoaPods for Xcode](https://github.com/kattrali/cocoapods-xcode-plugin)
---
Dependency management helper for your CocoaPods, right in Xcode.

9. [HOStringSense for Xcode](https://github.com/holtwick/HOStringSense-for-Xcode)
---
Makes working with strings less "escaped".

### Authors and Contributors
RamaKrishna (@rakii) Myself currently contributing to the repo. Feel free to fork it while maintaining the quality of the repo.

### Support or Contact
Have interesting ideas?? Come let's work together in brings ideas to reality (https://github.com/rakii)
